Package assign2.ngram

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NGramContainer
    The NGramContainer interface specifies a container to hold ngram results, separately holding the context phrase, a list of predicted words, and a corresponding list of probabilities w.r.t.
    NGramMap
    Interface that supports a collection of ngrams, each held in an object of type NGramContainer.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NGramException
    This class represents any exceptions generated while dealing with NGrams.
